amendment.description: Amendment sought to require an EPA study to determine the long term impact of a complete ban on their authority to regulate greenhouse gases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-54 to require an EPA study to determine the long term impact of a complete ban on their authority to regulate greenhouse gases.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 259 (Roll no. 233).
